Today’s collection of Android deals are now live and waiting down below alongside pre-orders on the brand new Amazon Echo Dot Max, Echo Studio, Echo Show 8, and Echo Show 11. All of those offers also sit alongside launch deals on the new Anker 25W 3-in-1 Magnetic Charging Stand as well as its 2025 display-equipped 26,250mAh Prime Power Bank and the return of Prime Day pricing on the Galaxy Tab S10 FE/+ models. As for the apps, everything awaits down below.

items.title: Imgur is blocking users in the UK
items.summary: The image-sharing site Imgur has shut off access to UK users after the country’s data watchdog warned the platform of a fine, as reported earlier by the BBC. items.title: Don’t miss Samsung’s 2025 27- and 32-inch Odyssey OLED G8 4K 240Hz gaming monitors while they’re up to $470 off
items.summary:
Over at Samsung, you’ll find the brand’s latest Odyssey G8 (G81SF) QD-OLED 27-inch gaming monitor down at $829.99 shipped with a $50 upgrade bonus credit that auto-applies during checkout for instant redemption. Similarly, the 32-inch model is available for $949.99 shipped at the moment. These typically go for $1,300, so you’re looking at up to $470 in savings right now. These are the lowest prices we have tracked for these models to date, so be sure to jump in if you were eyeing these and were waiting for a discount. Amazon is matching the base discounted prices at $879.99 and $999.99 shipped for the 27-inch and 32-inch models, respectively, but you’ll miss out on the upgrade bonus. Head below for more details.

more…

items.summary: Initially announced in January, the deal brings the companies closer to finalizing an agreement that is anticipated to disrupt the streaming industry by making Hulu a far bigger threat to its larger rival, YouTube.

items.title: Microsoft is giving Copilot AI faces you can chat with
items.summary: Microsoft is trying to make Copilot more approachable by giving the AI assistant an animated face to talk with. The experimental “Portraits” feature in Copilot Labs is currently available in the US, UK, and Canada, and provides 40 stylized human avatars that respond with natural expressions during real-time voice conversations. items.summary: Beats has announced a new version of the Fit Pro wireless earbuds that launched in late 2021, which are now called the Powerbeats Fit. The currently invite-only app resembles TikTok with a feed of videos you can shuffle through. But instead of encouraging people […]

items.title: Greenworks’ 2nd-gen 40V 12-inch cordless compact chainsaw with a 2.0Ah battery is back down at $128 (Reg. $170)
items.summary:
Amazon is offering the Greenworks 40V 12-inch Gen 2 Cordless Compact Chainsaw with 2.0Ah battery at $127.99 shipped, which matches the price we’re seeing direct from the brand’s website. Outside of discounts, you’d be shelling out $170 for this model at full price, which we’ve seen dropping to $128 twice before in 2025 and a fall lower to $120 that occurred during July’s Prime Day event. You can pick your own up today with $42 slashed from the tag, giving you the second-best price of the year that only sits $8 above July’s annual low.

Amazon’s early Prime Big deal Days sale is now in full swing. And just after unveiling its next-generation Echo speakers and displays, alongside the latest Ring and Blink cams, the new Kindle Scribe Colorsoft, and more, we have rounded up all of the best early deals on the existing gear for folks not looking to pay the full price premium on the latest. Deals start from just $18 Prime shipped – scope them all out down below.

items.title: Save up to 28% on BougeRV’s portable electric coolers for any of your vehicles starting from $160 (Reg. $190+)
items.summary:
Through its official Amazon storefront, BougeRV is offering up to 28% discounts on a lineup of 12V portable electric fridge/freezers, starting with the 23-Quart Portable Cooler at $159.99 shipped, with other 30, 42, and 53-quart sizes available below the fold, all with multiple colorways to choose from. The smallest of these here would normally run you $190 at full price, which we’ve mostly seen drop between $170 and $160 over the year, with some select falls lower to $157 last seen in August. Today’s deal gives you a solid $30 markdown off the going rate for the second-best price of the year and the fourth-lowest overall – just $8 above the all-time low.

items.title: Save $450 on Lenovo’s AMD-powered Yoga 7 2-in-1 14-inch 2K touchscreen Copilot+ PC while it’s down to $700
items.summary:
Alongside its now live Prime Day competitor sale, Best Buy is offering Lenovo’s Yoga 7 14-inch 2-in-1 Copilot+ PC down at $699.99 shipped. This is regularly a $1,150 notebook which is now seeing a $440 discount. We saw the 16-inch variant of this laptop with a Ryzen AI 5 340 processor drop to $550 a few days back, but this is the first time we’re seeing this 14-inch model with AMD’s Ryzen AI 7 350 chip drop this low. The same laptop, in case you’re wondering, is currently fetching its full price directly at Lenovo. Head below for more details.

items.title: ECOVACS’ three Goat RTK robot lawn mowers see up to $900 discounts starting from a new $785 low (Reg. $1,000+)
items.summary:
Amazon is offering a lower-than-ever rate on the ECOVACS Goat O1000 RTK Robot Lawn Mower for $784.99 shipped, which beats out its direct pricing from the brand’s website by $15. While it carries a $1,000 MSRP, this model has been recently keeping down at $900, with some falls over the year having seen things go to $850 and a one-time $841. The deal here today is going lower than ever, as the 22% markdown cuts $215 off the full price tag for a new all-time low. We’re also seeing discounts on its two upgraded models, which we’ve collected together below.

items.title: Ring unveils lineup of 2K and 4K cameras supported by AI to interact with visitors and track down lost dogs
items.summary:
Today, as part of Amazon’s live 2025 device reveal event, Ring has unveiled its first-ever 4K cameras (and two 2K cameras) supported by AI for even more advanced security around your home. This is the most advanced lineup from the brand to date, with seven new models to choose from and AI support that helps to reunite lost pets with their loving families. These new devices capture critical details with precision, as the brand puts it: with “videos that look closer to what your eyes can naturally see.” Head below to learn more about this new generation of security devices.

items.title: Amazon just unleashed its new Blink 2K security camera lineup with Arc accessory for 180-degree FoV
items.summary:
Amazon has debuted a bunch of new devices as part of its fall hardware event, including a new lineup for 2K security cameras. Amazon’s security camera brand Blink will have two new security cameras up for grabs later today – the Outdoor 2K+ and the Mini 2K+, both with support for up to 2K resolution. Additionally, we also got a new accessory called Blink Arc, which will let you combine two Blink Mini 2K+ cameras into a single unit for a seamlessly stitched 180-degree FoV feed. The Blink Outdoor 2K+ is priced at $89.99 shipped, while the Mini 2K+ will cost you $49.99 shipped. Head below for more details on the new cameras as well as the Arc accessory.

more…

items.title: Amazon reveals all-new Kindle Scribe lineup, including very first model with color display
items.summary:
As part of today’s live event in NYC, the all-new Kindle Scribe Colorsoft has been revealed. This new reader-meets-tablet takes on all of the stylus action of the existing Kindle Scribe, but as the name suggests also delivers a full color screen like that of the existing Kindle Colorsoft. There’s some other new models too.

items.title: Lexar’s 2TB 7,400MB/s NM790 Gen 4 SSD hits lowest price of the year at $110
items.summary:
We are now tracking a deal at Amazon that drops the 2TB Lexar NM790 Gen 4 NVMe M.2 SSD down to $109.99 shipped. This drive has recently sold for up to $160, so today’s deal saves you $50 off the usual price. It’s also $10 below its previous 2025 low, making it the year’s lowest price we’ve tracked. The NM790 is also available in 1TB, 4TB, and 8TB capacities, and they’re all discounted right now as well, with up to 27% in savings. Head below for more details.
